    Rawdatul Atfaal Aqeedah Program

    Building a strong foundation in Islamic belief and creed based on the Qur'an and Sunnah as understood by the righteous predecessors. We teach authentic Islamic creed free from innovations.

    Why Choose Our Aqeedah Program?

    We teach authentic Islamic creed based on the Quran and Sunnah, as understood by the Salaf us-Salih (righteous predecessors)

    Authentic Creed

    Learning Islamic belief based on Quran and Sunnah

    One-on-One Classes

    Personalized learning with dedicated attention from your teacher.

    Structured Learning

    Comprehensive curriculum for understanding Tawheed

    Certification

    Official certification upon completion of each level

    Our Learning Process

    A structured approach to understanding Islamic belief

    01

    Foundation

    Introduction to Islamic belief and the pillars of faith

    02

    Understanding Tawheed

    Learning the oneness of Allah in worship and belief

    03

    Names & Attributes

    Study of Allah's beautiful names and attributes

    04

    Advanced Topics

    Understanding matters of belief in depth

    Our Teaching Methodology

    We teach authentic Islamic creed based on the understanding of the Salaf us-Salih. Our approach emphasizes correct belief in Allah, His Names and Attributes, and all pillars of faith.

    Evidence-Based Learning

    Every concept taught with proofs from Quran and Sunnah

    Age-Appropriate Content

    Simplified explanations suitable for children

    Covering all essential aspects of Islamic belief
